The code that had the issue was when it was resetting the font. It needs to do 
this as the text needs to scale with the window and the height will change.

It is a chat text box which is updated constantly. 

Not sure how many lines were in the buffer or where the caret was at the time, 
but it would happen consistently when the buffer got larger.

I managed to work around it by moving the selection back 50 characters before 
resetting the font and then moving it back after using setTopIndex.

Just thought I would log this to ensure it gets looked at.
